briefTitle: SonoVue速-Enhanced Ultrasound (US) Versus Unenhanced US for Focal Liver Lesion Characterization
officialTitle: Characterization Of Focal Liver Lesions With Sonovue速-Enhanced Ultrasound Imaging: A Phase III, Intrapatient Comparative Study Versus Unenhanced Ultrasound Imaging Using Histology Or Combined Imaging/Clinical Data As Truth Standard
summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the Sensitivity and Specificity of SonoVue速-enhanced ultrasound is superior to that of unenhanced ultrasound for the characterization of benign versus malignant FLLs using final diagnosis based on histology or combined imaging (CE-CT and/or CE MRI)/clinical data as truth standard.

primaryOutcome.measure: Sensitivity: Percentage of True Positive Lesions Among All Malignant Lesions Per Truth Standard
